Source.Name: turpial
Source.Summary: Turpial is a mocroblogging client for social sites and networks such as Twitter and Identi.ca
Turpial es un cliente microblogging para las redes Twitter e Identi.ca
Source.Description: Turpial is a microblogging client written in Python. It is lightweight, functional and does not harm the ozone layer.
Turpial es un cliente de microblogging escrito en Python. Es ligero, funcional, y no da√±a la capa de ozono.
